properties.name: Bar Harbour Cellars
properties.description: Posted by NewenglandgrownWinery on working produce farm. From the website: “Our wines are produced from a variety of grapes grown in small co-ops throughout Europe and North America. Our vineyard will offer our own grapes by 2007.” Sustainable agriculture a priority. Farmhouse gift shop sells wine, fresh flowers and produce from the farm. Tastings offered daily (in season).

properties.name: Bartlett Maine Estate Winery
properties.description: Posted by NewenglandgrownGouldsboro, MEOldest and largest winery in Maine (according to website). More than 20 varieties of wine available. From the website: We make wine that evolves in concert with our environment, our community, and the availability of our ingredients. We\'re committed to using only pure, top quality fruits that grow naturally in our region. Tasting room open May  October.

properties.name: Bishops Orchard Winery & Farm Market
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown1355 Boston Post Road, Guilford, CTWinery on 320-acre working farm, est. 1871. Seven varieties of apple wine available for sale in farm market. Pick-your-own produce available June - October. Open 7 days a week.

properties.name: Boyden Valley Winery
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown Rt 104, Cambridge, VTWinery located in a restored 1825 carriage barn on 1,000 acre maple farm. 15 different wines available. Event rental available (Capacity: 85 seated indoors, 45 outdoors). Open Tuesday–Sunday May 31 – December 31, Friday–Sunday January 1 to May 30. Tours at 11:30 and 1:00 daily when open. Group tours and tastings available by appointment.

properties.name: Chamard Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown115 Cow Hill Road, Clinton, CTWinery on 20-acre vineyard. From the website: Chamard Vineyards is dedicated to producing fine wines from classic European wine grapes. A blend of time-honored wine making techniques and state of the art winery equipment are used to create world class wines. The main focus at Chamard is on Chardonnay. Complementary tastings available Tuesday-Sunday, year-round. Tours at 1 p.m. and 3 p.m.

properties.name: DiGrazia Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown131 Tower Road, Brookfield, CTFrom the website: Over 15 wines are offered, ranging from dry to sweet, using estate grown grapes, local fruit and honey. Visitors can enjoy a guided winery tour and wine tasting, country gift shop, and picnic area on our arbor patio. Open 7 days a week May  December; Saturday and Sunday January  April.

properties.name: Flag Hill Winery & Distillery
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown297 North River Road, Lee, NHWinery and distillery on 20+ acre working farm. From the website: In 2004, 114 acres of Flag Hill property were put into protection through a conservation easement supported by the Land and Community Heritage Program (LCHIP.) This includes 72 acres in or slated for agricultural production, 1,500\' of undeveloped frontage on the Lamprey River, and 1,400\' of undeveloped frontage on the North River. Winery tour and vodka-making demonstration available. Catering facility available. Gift store carries a variety of NH-made products. Open Wednesday  Sunday, year round.

properties.name: Gouveia Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown1339 Whirlwind Hill Rd, Wallingford, CTWinery on 140 acre vineyard. 7 different wines available. Wine gift baskets available. Tastings Friday  Sunday, year-round.

properties.name: Greenvale Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown582 Wapping Road, Portsmouth, RIWinery on 19th century Victorian Farm. On the Rhode Island Register of Historic Places and the National Register of Historic Places. Tasting room in restored 1862 stable. Wedding/event rental available. Vineyard tours at 2:00 daily, year-round.

properties.name: Haight Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown29 Chestnut Hill Road, Litchfield, CTWinery on 25 acre vineyard. 7 different wines available. Complimentary tasting and winery tours offered year-round, 7 days a week.

properties.name: Heritage Trail Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown291 N. Burnham Highway, Lisbon, CTWinery in 18th century home on 38-acre vineyard. From the website: The vineyard produces a limited number of cases each year from premium varietals of Cabernet Franc, Chardonnay, and French-American hybrids such as Vignoles and Cayuga White, all of which are estate-grown. Indoor and outdoor wedding rental available. Open Friday through Sunday, May  December. Open by appointment January  April.

properties.name: Hopkins Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown25 Hopkins Road, New Preston, CTWinery in restored 1850s barn on 35 acre family farm. Tastings and guided tours available. Wedding/event rental available. Gift shop and Hayloft wine bar on-site. Open 7 days a week, May  December; Wednesday  Sunday, March and April; Friday  Sunday, January and February.

properties.name: Jerram Winery
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown535 Town Hill Road, New Hartford, CT10 different wines available at winery in historic Town Hill section of Hartford. Rental available for social/business receptions, art openings. Open Thursday - Sunday, year round. Private group tastings available by appointment.

properties.name: Jonathan Edwards Winery
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown74 Chester Maine Road, North Stonington, CTWinery on 48-acre hilltop. Gift shop carries wine-related items and local, seasonal treats. Gift baskets available. Picnics welcome. Loft gallery showcases local art. Open Wednesday - Sunday, year round. Guided tours at 2 p.m. on weekdays, 2 p.m. to 4 p.m. on weekends.

properties.name: Priam Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown11 Shailor Hill Road, Colchester, CTWinery on 40-acre farm. 13 different wines available. Farmer\'s Market in the vineyard every Friday, 3-6 p.m. July 7 through October 7. Open for tastings and self-guided tours of the vineyard Friday, Saturday, Sunday and select holidays, March through December. Guided tours available by appointment.
